frontMatter.title: The Absurdity of the term "AI Engineer"
frontMatter.summary: Integrating a third-party LLM SDK does not make you an AI Engineer: a rant on the inflation of job titles in the age of ChatGPT wrappers.

prev.title: Experimenting with SQL:2023 Property-Graph Queries in Postgres 18
prev.summary: Hands-on guide to the upcoming SQL/PGQ graph syntax using a patched Postgres 18 beta.

next.title: Disposable Software: When generating code costs less than finding it
next.summary: LLMs have made generating code nearly free, but maintaining it hasn't changed. On the growing plague of code that shouldn't exist and the discipline of searching before building.
